projects.title: Not Here Right Now: A Live One-Man Show
projects.creator: Royce Bable
projects.description: Royce, an ambitious 20-something, trades in his promising corporate media research career for a one-way ticket to Southeast Asia.

projects.title: Smore Magazine: Ignite Her Brilliance
projects.creator: Sarita Menon
projects.description: An unconventional comic book style science magazine designed to get girls STEM-smart. Created for girls. Recommended for all humans.

projects.title: 2084: Sci-fi short story anthology inspired by Orwell
projects.creator: Unsung Stories
projects.description: Predictions of our future, inspired by George Orwell's Nineteen Eighty-Four, from 12 leading science fiction writers.

projects.title: Hidden Time Watch
projects.creator: Anicorn Watches
projects.description: The first edition of The Trio of Time, featuring a vanishing timepiece beautifully designed to alter your perception of passing hours.
